install: cd 'on brand' && xcodebuild -project 'on brand.xcodeproj' -scheme 'on brand' -configuration Debug build
start: cd 'on brand' && xcodebuild -project 'on brand.xcodeproj' -scheme 'on brand' -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' run

terminals.name: iOS Simulator
terminals.command: cd 'on brand' && xcrun simctl boot 'iPhone 15' || echo 'Simulator already running'

terminals.name: Build Monitor
terminals.command: cd 'on brand' && xcodebuild -project 'on brand.xcodeproj' -scheme 'on brand' -configuration Debug build
